legal_requirements.parties_identified: Clearly identify landlord and tenant legal entities, including ABN/ACN where applicable.
legal_requirements.premises_description: Describe the leased premises with address, boundaries, and inclusions.
legal_requirements.lease_term: State commencement, expiry, and any option periods.
legal_requirements.rent_details: Detail base rent, payment frequency, and method.
legal_requirements.rent_review_clause: Include mechanism and schedule for rent reviews.
legal_requirements.outgoings_clause: Define recoverable outgoings and disclosure requirements per QLD Retail Shop Leases Act.
legal_requirements.permitted_use: Specify permitted business activities within premises.
legal_requirements.assignment_terms: Outline conditions and approvals for assignment/subletting.
legal_requirements.termination_clause: Describe termination rights, breach remedies, and notice periods.
legal_requirements.registration_requirement: Clarify obligation to register lease if term exceeds 3 years in QLD.

company_requirements.minimum_notice_period_days: Provide at least 30 days written notice for landlord-initiated changes.
company_requirements.maximum_security_deposit_months: Security deposit must not exceed 2 months of gross rent.
company_requirements.require_maintenance_schedule: Attach preventative maintenance responsibilities and schedule.
company_requirements.prohibit_auto_renewal: Do not include automatic renewal without explicit tenant opt-in.
company_requirements.require_force_majeure_clause: Include force majeure terms covering natural disasters and pandemics.
company_requirements.environmental_compliance_clause: Address environmental compliance and hazardous materials removal.

legal_requirements.parties_identified: List landlord/agent and tenant full names and contact details.
legal_requirements.premises_condition_report: Attach Entry Condition Report per RTRA Act.
legal_requirements.rent_details: Specify rent amount, frequency, payment method, and increases.
legal_requirements.bond_lodgement: State rental bond amount and RTA lodgement obligations.
legal_requirements.utilities_obligations: Clarify responsibility for utilities, water charges, and metering.
legal_requirements.notice_requirements: Detail minimum notice periods for entry, termination, and rent increases.
legal_requirements.maintenance_obligations: Outline repair/maintenance responsibilities and emergency processes.
legal_requirements.minimum_housing_standards: Reference compliance with QLD Minimum Housing Standards.

company_requirements.insurance_requirements: Confirm landlord insurance coverage for property and liability.
company_requirements.dispute_resolution_process: Include internal escalation path before RTA dispute.
company_requirements.data_privacy: Commit to protecting tenant personal information per company policy.
